profile.name: Aditya Kumar Puri
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.bio: Software Engineer with expertise in full-stack development, AI/ML systems, and cloud architecture. Experienced in building scalable applications, implementing RAG systems, and orchestrating complex AI workflows.

highlights: Built file upload optimization and video processing systems using AWS Step Functions and EKS, cutting latency while streamlining media handling pipelines
Set up monitoring infrastructure with Sentry, AWS CloudWatch, and RUM to track system performance and catch issues before they affected users
Designed AI-powered RAG systems with voice transcription capabilities and orchestrated complex AI workflows using n8n for seamless integration across services
Developed agentic systems using LangChain and leveraged Redis as a caching database to accelerate query performance and reduce response times
Migrated legacy web application from VM-based infrastructure to scalable serverless architecture reducing operational overhead
Deployed production applications using AWS Amplify and Elastic Beanstalk with RDBMS integration for improved scalability
Designed and architected scalable system for quick commerce platform while gaining expertise in cost optimization and billing management
